snippet.title: Winter Dream Opening
snippet.description:
During his winter vacation, Caron moves in with his uncle Daniel who owns a restaurant. While staying there, he meets three girls each of them having some kind of tragic past. No matter where he goes, he can't avoid running into one of them. First, there's Velda, who is extremely rude, then Gwen who happens to be somewhat shy, and finally Rose, who seems way too nice. As he gets to know these girls, Caron will learn about their pasts and their connection to him.

This visual novel is heavily inspired by works from Key/Visual Arts, who are known for Kanon, Clannad, Little Busters, and Summer Pockets. If you have any interest in those, you might want to check this out.

Info & Download: https://conorhehr.weebly.com/winter-dream.html
